nodes.documentation:
@title A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.
@dev This proxy is intended to be used in conjunction with EIP-1167 minimal proxies.
nodes.name: InitializableProxy
_initialize

attributes.documentation:
@title A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.
@dev This proxy is intended to be used in conjunction with EIP-1167 minimal proxies.
attributes.name: InitializableProxy
_initialize

devdoc.details: This proxy is intended to be used in conjunction with EIP-1167 minimal proxies.

_initialize(address).details: Note that anyone is allowed to set the proxy owner if it is set to the null address.

params.owner: The address allowed to repoint the proxy to a new implementation.

_setAndInitializeImplementation(address,.details: Throws if the initialization callback fails.If the target contract does not need initialization, use setImplementation instead.

params.callbackData: The abi-encoded function call to perform in the implementation contract.
params.implementation: Address of the new target contract.

_setImplementation(address).details: If the target contract needs to be initialized, call setAndInitializeImplementation instead.

params.implementation: Address of the new target contract.

params.newOwner: Address of the new owner account.

constructor.details: This contract is intended to be the target of delegatecalls from EIP-1167 proxies.     As such, we take precautions here to ensure that this contract can never be pointed to     an implementation, which would then risk that this contract could be selfdestructed,     which would "brick" all EIP-1167 clones of this contract.

devdoc.title: A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.

_initialize(address).notice: Sets the proxy owner if it hasn't already been set.

_setAndInitializeImplementation(address,.notice: Sets the address of the implementation contract and calls into it.

_setImplementation(address).notice: Sets the address of the implementation contract.

_transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of Proxy to a new owner.

methods.constructor: Sets proxy ownership to an unrecoverable address.
